channel.title: Class Types In UI
channel.description:
In the classes UI, it's really nice seeing all the classes for each faction, but I think it could also be a good idea to have a small menu near the bottom or wherever there's space, allowing for the classes in each class type to be viewed exclusively, also sorted by faction, so that new players or veterans can know which classes are in which class type.
For example: A player could click on an Investigative button and get a list of the following classes:
Blue Dragon: Observer Paladin Princess Sheriff
Unseen: Duchess Marshal Nightwatch
Cult: Seeker
Neutral: Inquisitor
